name: Misfortune
overview: A scrolling screen platformer by Mathew Cox, Dwayne J. Bakewell, Matthew McHugo & Kellie New and released in 1999 in Loadstar #185, Loadstar #248, and also in Reset #10 Mix-i-Disk. In this game you will find yourself jumping for keys in a side-scrolling winter wonderland. A jump and shoot game from Bad Bytes, an Australian coding group. There are 5 worlds to explore and each one contains five keys that must be gathered to a chest. You can move your little guy underneath square blocks and bump into them changing color or giving a power up icon. Some will contain keys. You can also find, coins, extra time, point bonuses and 3 different attack powers. If you pass a check point marker it will change colors and you can start there if you die. Remember there is a time limit so you have to hunt and kill fast.
